text: Va cun mū'minon on gurūhhoro didand, ki atrofi Madinaro ihota kardaand, ʙa jod ovardand, ki nusrati Alloh nazdik ast, guftand: In hamon cizest, ki Alloh va Pajomʙaraş ʙa mo va'da dodaast; az imtihon va mehnat va nusrat, rost guftaand va in ʙa onon çuz ʙa imon va taslimaşon najafzud. Ja'ne imonaşon ʙa Alloh va amalaşon ʙa farmudahoi Ū zijod gaşt
